data.lyric:
[ti:Doin' This]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:Doin' This]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.31]Doin' This - Luke Combs
[00:01.34]Lyrics by：Luke Combs/Drew Parker/Robert Williford
[00:03.12]Composed by：Luke Combs/Drew Parker/Robert Williford
[00:04.76]
[00:10.41]Someone asked me once in an interview
[00:14.57]What was growing up like
[00:16.69]Where'd you go to school
[00:18.15]And what would you do if you weren't doin' this
[00:24.78]
[00:27.07]I'd be drivin' my first car an old worn-out Dodge
[00:31.66]Tryin' to make rent with a dead-end job just makin' due
[00:37.16]
[00:39.05]With tips in a jar my guitar and an old barstool
[00:45.06]
[00:48.03]I'd have a Friday night crowd in the palm of my hand
[00:52.63]Cup of brown liquor couple buddies in a band
[00:56.84]Singin' them same d**n songs like I am now
[01:01.92]
[01:04.67]I'd be feelin' on fire on a hardwood stage
[01:09.37]Bright lights like lightning runnin' through my veins
[01:13.49]At the Grand Ole Opry or a show in some no-name town
[01:18.78]I'd still be doin' this if I wasn't doin' this
[01:23.12]
[01:29.81]I'd still be the same guy they knew back in the day
[01:34.37]Who was burnin' CD's just to give away
[01:38.02]Payin' his dues if I wasn't doin' this
[01:44.19]
[01:46.92]Five deep in a van head full of steam
[01:50.24]
[01:51.36]Hot on the heels of my neon dreams maybe comin' true
[01:56.55]
[01:58.53]Livin' this life just like I was born to do
[02:04.33]
[02:07.19]I'd have a Friday night crowd in the palm of my hand
[02:11.91]Cup of brown liquor couple buddies in a band
[02:15.63]
[02:16.16]Singin' them same d**n songs like I am now
[02:21.27]
[02:23.97]I'd be feelin' on fire on a hardwood stage
[02:28.63]Bright lights like lightning runnin' through my veins
[02:32.21]
[02:32.76]At the Grand Ole Opry or a show in some no-name town
[02:38.13]I'd still be doin' this if I wasn't doin' this
[02:42.49]
[02:49.59]It ain't about the fame
[02:51.16]
[02:51.74]It ain't about the fortune
[02:53.85]It ain't about the name
[02:55.75]It ain't about the glory
[02:57.93]I guess I'm sayin' it's always been about
[03:03.05]
[03:05.76]Having a Friday night crowd in the palm of my hand
[03:10.32]Cup of brown liquor couple buddies in a band
[03:14.63]Singin' them same d**n songs like I am now
[03:19.64]
[03:22.49]I'd be feelin' on fire on a hardwood stage
[03:27.13]Bright lights like lightning runnin' through my veins
[03:31.12]At the Grand Ole Opry or a show in some no-name town
[03:36.57]I'd still be doin' this if I wasn't doin' this
[03:40.85]
[03:47.45]Someone asked me once in an interview
[03:51.58]What was growing up like
[03:53.68]Where'd you go to school
[03:55.26]And what would you do if you weren't doin' this
data.trans:
[ti:Doin' This]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:Doin' This]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.31]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.34]//
[00:03.12]//
[00:04.76]
[00:10.41]面试的时候有人问我
[00:14.57]成长是什么样的感觉
[00:16.69]你是在哪里念的书
[00:18.15]如果你没有得到这份找工作 你会做什么
[00:24.78]
[00:27.07]我会开上我第一辆车 一辆老旧的道奇车
[00:31.66]努力靠一份没有前途的工作来支付房租 只要能偿还债务
[00:37.16]
[00:39.05]罐子里装着小费 背上我的吉他 坐在老旧的高脚凳上
[00:45.06]
[00:48.03]我会拥有一个周五夜晚 台下一群观众
[00:52.63]一杯棕色的酒 几个乐队的朋友
[00:56.84]像现在一样 给他们演唱那几首歌
[01:01.92]
[01:04.67]在硬木舞台上 我会感觉热情似火
[01:09.37]明亮灯光 像是电流穿过我的全身
[01:13.49]在乡村大剧院 或是无名城镇上的表演
[01:18.78]如果我没有得到这份工作 我依然会从事这一行
[01:23.12]
[01:29.81]我还会是从前他们认识的那个人
[01:34.37]刻录CD就为了送给别人
[01:38.02]偿还给他欠下的债 如果我没有得到这份工作
[01:44.19]
[01:46.92]五个人挤在一个小火车里 热情满满地创作
[01:50.24]
[01:51.36]近在咫尺 我五彩缤纷的梦或许可以成真
[01:56.55]
[01:58.53]过着这样的生活 就好像我为此而生
[02:04.33]
[02:07.19]我会开上我第一辆车 台下一群观众
[02:11.91]一杯棕色的酒 几个乐队的朋友
[02:15.63]
[02:16.16]像现在一样 给他们演唱同样的歌曲
[02:21.27]
[02:23.97]在硬木舞台上 我会感觉热情似火
[02:28.63]明亮灯光 像是电流穿过我的全身
[02:32.21]
[02:32.76]在乡村大剧院 或是无名城镇上的表演
[02:38.13]如果你没有得到这份找工作 我依然会从事这一行
[02:42.49]
[02:49.59]这无关名气
[02:51.16]
[02:51.74]这无关财富
[02:53.85]这无关名号
[02:55.75]这无关荣誉
[02:57.93]我想我要说我的一生都会是这样
[03:03.05]
[03:05.76]我会拥有一个周五夜晚 台下一群观众
[03:10.32]一杯棕色的酒 几个乐队的朋友
[03:14.63]像现在一样 给他们演唱同样的歌曲
[03:19.64]
[03:22.49]站在硬木舞台上 我会感觉热情似火
[03:27.13]明亮灯光 像是电流穿过我的全身
[03:31.12]在乡村大剧院 或是无名城镇上的表演
[03:36.57]如果我没有进入这一行 我依然会从事这工作
[03:40.85]
[03:47.45]面试的时候有人问我
[03:51.58]成长是什么样的感觉
[03:53.68]你是在哪里念的书
[03:55.26]如果你没有得到这份找工作 你会做什么
